author: Harry Craddock
description: Gin-laced sweet and tart sloe berry sit over a savoury end to this particular Eclipse.
name: Eclipse Cocktail (by Harry Craddock)

recipeInstructions.text: Drop pitted black olive into glass and cover with grenadine
STIR gin and sloe gin with ice and carefully strain and slowly pour down the shaft of a bar spoon to layer over grenadine
